structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.text: Nothing in KRS 311.950 to 311.964 shall be construed as constituting an endorsement of amygdalin (laetrile) for the treatment of any malignancy, disease, illness, or physical condition.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 354, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1980.
